snippet.title: Pirate Combat Trainer - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Pirate Combat Trainer is a casual wave shooter where you take command of a small sailing ship. Every wave you will take on multiple enemy Pirate Ships. Position your ship so that you have a wind advantage. Dodge enemy cannon fire to stay alive. Fire your cannons back at the enemy to take them down. Keep your ship repaired to stay in the fight.

Each wave you will face off with more and more ships. As the difficulty increases your tactical abilities and naval aptitude will determine how long you will survive. Your high Score is determined by how much damage you do.
